title: (x) Wide sans caps in Fantastic Man magazine - Engravers Gothic {BJ}
content:
Could you tell me what is the san-serif font used in fantastic man magazine by jop van bennekom.  
I attach the font imege.  
I've found the serif one is "Times New Roman" relatively easily ,because I've got it in my mac.  
But I have no clue with the san-serif one.  
I'm so poor about non-japnaese typeface because im japanese!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130108021022im_/http:/typophile.com/files/picture_6698.png)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130108021022im_/http:/typophile.com/files/picture2_4874.png)
author: takao

comments.content:
Looks like Sackers Gothic, Engravers Gothic, ITC Blair

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/engravers-gothic/engravers-gothic/](http://web.archive.org/web/20130108021022/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/engravers-gothic/engravers-gothic/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/engravers-gothic/engravers-gothic/")

best guess is Engravers

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130108021022im_/http:/typophile.com/files/engravers_5544.jpg)

thank you.  
I guess that's exatlly what I'm looking for!
